description: This file defines the NotesRepository class which provides methods to interact with a notes backend API via HTTP requests. It includes functions to get, add, update, delete, and search notes, utilizing Ktor client for network communication. The class manages API headers, constructs requests, and parses JSON responses.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing notes via REST API, providing methods for CRUD operations and search.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes from the backend, returning a list of Note objects.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note with the specified title and content, returning the created Note object.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id with new title and content, returning true if successful.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by id, returning true if deletion was successful.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches notes by a search string in title or content, returning a list of matching notes.
